videos.headline: Defense leads to offense for Wisconsin

videos.description: Wisconsin is off and running early against Rutgers when Nigel Hayes makes the steal and races down the court, hitting the tough layup to give the Badgers an 8-0 run to start the game.
videos.headline: Hayes makes the steal and then hits circus-shot layup
Wisconsin's guard gets the big block
Wisconsin guard gets the nice layin

videos.description: Bob Picozzi and LaPhonso Ellis down the play of Wisconsin's Nigel Hayes in a 72-52 victory over Rutgers.
videos.headline: Hayes impresses in win over Rutgers

videos.description: Nigel Hayes scores 20 points as No. 14 Wisconsin improves to 12-2 with a 72-52 victory over Rutgers.
videos.headline: Wisconsin drops Rutgers to win 15th straight at home
